markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flying Kick](/Feats.aspx?ID=5993) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You launch yourself at a foe. Make a [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=2298) or attempt a [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378). At the end of the jump, if you're adjacent to a foe, you can immediately Strike that foe with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) attack, even if the foe is in midair. You fall to the ground after the Strike. If the distance you fall is no more than the height of your jump, you land upright and take no damage.
name: Flying Kick

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Flying Kick Two Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 121 1.1 --- You launch yourself at a foe. Make a Leap or attempt a High Jump or Long Jump. At the end of the jump, if you're adjacent to a foe, you can immediately Strike that foe with an unarmed attack, even if the foe is in midair. You fall to the ground after the Strike. If the distance you fall is no more than the height of your jump, you land upright and take no damage.
